title: The Heat 2013 1080p Riffed-by-MST3K-Joel-Trace-Josh 6ch 2ch x264
description:
The.Heat.Theatrical.2013.1080p.Riffed-by-MST3K-Joel-Trace-Josh.6ch.2ch.2subs.x264.mkv

DEFAULT AUDIO IS TRACK1 MOVIE PLUS JOEL/TRACE/JOSH (FROM MST3K) COMMENTARY
FOR MOVIE ONLY SOUND SWITCH TO TRACK2 FOR 5.1 OR TRACK3 FOR 2.0

The Heat (2013) (Theatrical cut)
video: 1920x800 AVC CRF=22.25 ~2220kbps preset=veryslow

1h57m04s 2,605,581,050bytes
  http://www.imdb.com/title/tt2404463/  

This is an AVC/LC-AAC encode of the THEATRICAL cut of The Heat (2013) from Blu-Ray with the Joel/Trace/Josh (from MST3K) commentary added as the default audio track. The movie plus commentary audio track has been processed to make the movie closer in volume to the commentary. 

Audio track 1 is an unscripted riff commentary by the original MST3K performers:
Joel Hodgson: s0-s5 Joel Robinson
Trace Beaulieu: s0-s7 Dr Clayton Forrester, Crow T. Robot
Josh Weinstein: s0-s1 Dr Laurence "Larry" Erhardt, Tom Servo

The Joel/Trace/Josh commentary runs for the entire theatrical cut of the movie from 3seconds in until 1sec before the end of the film. This is very much like season0 when they would watch MST3K movies for the first time and riff them on the fly.

Director Paul Feig: "It's Josh Weinstein and Trace Beaulieu and Joel Hodgson doing it.  They just came in for one day.  They didn't even write it.  They just came in and did it as a favor with us for an hour or an hour and a half (laughs)."
